professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with expertise in database administration, high availability, disaster recovery, data transformation services (ETL), and security management. Skilled in working with SQL Server 2008-2014 versions, Always-On Availability Groups, linked servers, monitoring tools, and robust backup strategies.

key_responsibilities: Installed and maintained SQL Server 2008/2008 R2 in dev
test
and prod environments.
Performed database physical design and upgrades with application/client requirements.
Administered high availability and disaster recovery strategies using log shipping and mirroring.
Configured linked servers and data transformation services (SSIS) for ETL processes.
Customized applications to maintain database objects like tables
indexes
views
triggers
functions
and procedures.
Implemented SQL Server 2012 features such as data compression
online indexing
and Contained Databases.
Optimized database performance using DMV queries and tuned SQL objects for high efficiency.
Worked extensively on clustering and server consolidation issues.
Expanded disaster recovery strategies with additional replication and backup solutions.
Secured SQL Server access with minimum privileges and maintained security configurations.
Installed and configured SQL Server 2008/2008 R2 in production environments.
Performed database design and upgrades to meet business requirements.
Administered high availability and disaster recovery strategies using log shipping and mirroring.
Configured linked servers for data integration with other systems.
Implemented data transformation services (SSIS) for ETL processes.
Customized applications to maintain and optimize database performance.
Managed security policies and access controls for SQL Server environments.
